title: Haven't been receiving free cheests
body:
Hi,

Over the past couple weeks I've been trying to earn chests, so have been playing a number of champions that i own with which I haven't previously received chests.

With a couple of these champs (that i can remember volibear and gnar) either myself or a teammate has earnt an S grade but I haven't received my chest for this, have been trying to do this before my slots filled up but its at 4 now and haven't received anything so not sure if there's an issue or not.

Are chests supposed to be earnt every time you get an S with an owned champ or is it still down to luck even with the S whether it spawns or not? I've been trying to read up on how to earn chests, but even the hextech crafting guide doesn't seem that definitive. 

P.S. I posted this as a bug first but then thought it fit better here.

replies.body:
You are guaranteed a mastery chest by getting an S on a champion you own, but only once per champ per season.  You are also limited in how many mastery chests you can receive, and 1 chest will refresh each week.  There should be a line of chest icons on your profile, and mousing over should tell you your next refresh.

Regarding teammates, you'll only get it if they are in your premade before the match starts.  Any random teammate receiving an S will not reward a chest.  More info is also available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, but I hope that helps!
